participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and ambitious, with a passion for music and writing.
participant_1.background: I will study for my upcoming exams while others may watch some Jacob Sartorius music videos on YouTube. I love animals and I want to help them. I need some time to myself. I practice my guitar for hours every day, hoping to make it big in the local music scene. My father has a very prestigious job.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Friendly and family-oriented, with a love for the outdoors and event planning.
participant_2.background: I love my family and I'm sure they would love me no matter what. I love the outdoors. I hope my wedding planning business keeps booming as the weather warms up. My dad is very strict with his kids. My favorite book is David Copperfield.

content.text: How is your day going so far?
It's going well! My brother is in town for a visit and we are going to go kayaking later today.
Oh that sounds fun! I wish I had a brother.
I'm lucky to have mine. He's always been there for me.
What do you do for fun?
I like to go hiking, fishing, and camping. I also love to read.
I love to read too! I just finished reading "David Copperfield".
That's a great book! I read it a few years ago and really enjoyed it.
I want to be a writer when I grow up.
That's a great goal! I'm sure you'll be a great writer.
Thank you! What do you want to be when you grow up?
I want to be a wedding planner. I love planning events and making people happy.
That's a great goal too! I'm sure you'll be a great wedding planner.
